Acknowledgements / Influences

Influences:Fear by Thich Nhat Hanh, Jonathan Haidt,

Code

The Walk Algorithm has made me very happy over the years. Since it creates complex images from simple automata, it’s helped me step back and see my story as a part of a bigger picture. Since the algorithm is fun to extend, it’s kept me busy trying to develop new directions.

I hope that Walk will give you the same happiness that it has given me. I have benefited not just from viewing its outputs but also from working with the code itself, which I am sharing under a creative commons license on the wonderful openprocessing.org.
